## CompilerState.create() method

Create a compiler state for use with the specified `IExtractorInvokeOptions` .

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static create(extractorConfig: ExtractorConfig, options?: ICompilerStateCreateOptions): CompilerState;
```
